casebody.data:
Louis S. FOLINO, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Greene, et al., petitioners,
v.
Roderick JOHNSON. No. 12-1218. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 705 F.3d 117.

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
